Doc: A type that contains full details of a predefined fixed payout which may occur (or not) in a Barrier Option or Digital Option when a trigger event occurs (or not).

Source.Contents:
/#
   A type that contains full details of a predefined fixed payout which may occur (or not) in a Barrier Option or Digital Option when a trigger event occurs (or not).
 #/
record FpML5.reporting.FxOptionPayout {
  # The currency in which an amount is denominated.
  currency : string?

  # The non negative monetary quantity in currency units.
  amount : decimal?

  # The trigger event and payout may be asynchonous. A payout may become due on the trigger event, or the payout may (by agreeement at initiation) be deferred (for example) to the maturity date.
  payoutStyle : string?

  # The information required to settle a currency payment that results from a trade.
  settlementInformation : FpML5.reporting.SettlementInformation?

  id : string?

}

currency.Doc: The currency in which an amount is denominated.
currency.Name: currency

amount.Doc: The non negative monetary quantity in currency units.
amount.Name: amount

payoutStyle.Doc: The trigger event and payout may be asynchonous. A payout may become due on the trigger event, or the payout may (by agreeement at initiation) be deferred (for example) to the maturity date.
payoutStyle.Name: payoutStyle

settlementInformation.Doc: The information required to settle a currency payment that results from a trade.
settlementInformation.Name: settlementInformation
